Name: Stingray broth
Description: Not too salty, not too sweet.

NameLocalization.ja: スティングレイブロス

DescriptionLocalization.es: No demasiado salado, no demasiado dulce.
DescriptionLocalization.ko: 너무 짜지도 않고 너무 달지도 않습니다.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Nicht zu salzig, nicht zu süß.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Pas trop salé, pas trop sucré.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: Nem túl sós, nem túl édes.
DescriptionLocalization.it: Non troppo salato, non troppo dolce.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 塩辛すぎず、甘すぎない。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Nem tão salgado, nem tão doce.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Не слишком соленый, не слишком сладкий.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Ne çok tuzlu ne çok tatlı.
